name: Zeldio
description:
Zeldio

Zeldio is a 2D multiplayer game where you compete against other players to upgrade your character, survive the longest, and most importantly: have the heaviest wallet.
Show Controls: Escape

Move: WASD or Arrow Keys

Sword: Left Click / Period

Secondary Weapon: Right Click / Comma

Toggle Scoreboard: Tab

Change Color: Shift
